title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 141-3.10 - Residential unit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 141-3.10 - Residential unit

State Regulations
A
residential unit
is that portion of a
dwelling consisting of one or more living rooms, which group of rooms is
separated from all other groups within a dwelling. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
141-3.10

Amended

New

York State Register December 28, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 52, eff. 12/31/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
